mapper.sql: USER_ID, LOGIN_ACCOUNT, LOGIN_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_LEVEL, USER_DEPT, USER_STATUS, ISREVIEW, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_OPERATOR, SALT, FILE_PATH, REMARK1, REMARK2, REMARK3, REMARK4, REMARK5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOP_USERINFO ( USER_ID, LOGIN_ACCOUNT, LOGIN_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_LEVEL, USER_DEPT, USER_STATUS, ISREVIEW, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_OPERATOR, SALT, FILE_PATH, REMARK1, REMARK2, REMARK3, REMARK4, REMARK5 )VALUES ( #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isreview,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update TOP_USERINFO set LOGIN_ACCOUNT = #{loginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , LOGIN_PWD = #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , USER_LEVEL = #{userLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , USER_DEPT = #{userDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , USER_STATUS = #{userStatus,jdbcType=CHAR} , ISREVIEW = #{isreview,jdbcType=CHAR} , CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , UPDATE_OPERATOR = #{updateOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SALT = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , REMARK1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , REMARK2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , REMARK3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , REMARK4 = #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , REMARK5 = #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
